full_summary:
======================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title (English)**: Laboratory and Scientific Equipment
**Title (French)**: Équipements scientifiques et de laboratoire

**Reference Number**: cb-626-22531790
**Solicitation Number**: 2023-14053/A
**Publication Date**: 12-20-2023

**Tender Closing Date**: 01/29/2024, 02:00 PM EST
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Amendment Date**: 01/29/2024

**Contracting Entity**:
Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)
3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Z4, Canada

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**: The tender is open to suppliers from countries that are signatories to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements listed below (English only):

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Vendor Requirements**: The request is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI-XXX-PV only, for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies. Suppliers currently pre-qualified on this arrangement have been invited to bid.

**Evaluation Criteria**: The responsive bidder holding a Supply arrangement from Public Services and Procurement Canada (formerly known as Public Works and Government Services Canada) who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.
